mainHero.title: High Quality Dental Care & Treatment:
mainHero.subtitle: Bright Smile Dental Clinic
mainHero.description: Located in Kokrajhar, Assam, established by a team of two Dental practitioners backed through years of experience and accolades, we guarantee a good experience worth your time, and money. Book and appointment online, or call us!

items.title: Dr. Saroj Narzary | BDS (GU)
items.name: Dr. Saroj Narzary
items.description: Certified in Aesthetic dentistry | Certified for Orthodontic treatment.

items.title: Dr. Krishna Das Narzary | BDS, MDS, Periodontics (SSUHS)
items.name: Dr. Krishna Das Narzary
items.description: Ex - Assistant Lecturer at Gov. Dental College.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best care and technologies out there!
features.description: Our qualified Doctors, Equipment, and knowledge will ensure a good expeience for you and your family!

items.name: Quality Equipment
items.description: The latest technology, on par with any modern clinic, guarantees the best quality treatment for all your needs.

items.name: Hospitality
items.description: Our experienced staff will take care of all your needs and wants. Call us anytime for enquiries and requests!.

items.name: Hygiene
items.description: Our clinic is sanitized and we ensure cleanliness for everyone.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
